product_name: Darn Tough Light Hike Micro Crew Socks - Men's
long_description: Darn Tough Light Hiker Micro Crew men's socks provide miles of comfort and durability. These socks offer high-density cushioning underfoot and non-cushioned, wide-ribbed, crew-height legs. Darn Tough uses a custom-count, shrink-treated merino wool that enhances comfort and durability for outdoor activities. Merino wool wicks away moisture and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions. Ring-toe construction hides seams and enhances comfort. Reinforced at heels and toes; elastic arch support. Darn Tough recommends that you machine wash socks inside out in warm water on gentle cycle and tumble dry on low. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Darn Tough Light Hiker Micro Crew men's socks provide miles of comfort and durability. These socks offer high-density cushioning underfoot and non-cushioned, wide-ribbed, crew-height legs.
